'''''A Housekeeper's Daily Chores''''' is the first act of [[Thoma]]'s [[Hangout Event]].

In order to unlock this quest line, the player needs 2 [[Story Key]]s, must have reached [[Adventure Rank]] 30 and completed the {{Quest|Omnipresence Over Mortals}}.
